title: Case Studies and Reflective Analysis for Game-Based Improvement of Complex Cognitive Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Basic game design principles and mathematical problem-solving experience
context.additional_context: Strengthening competencies in game-based learning design and application in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment.

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more complex mathematical thinking strategies that utilize game mechanics.
Learners can apply cognitive skill instructional design frameworks by analyzing real-game cases.
Learners can derive educational insights for game-based learning design through reflective thematic analysis.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
